events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves a refund due to receiving an incorrect product in their order.
Assigning the refund case to the billing and returns specialist team for further handling.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product I received.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method and provide prepaid shipping to return the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I appreciate the quick resolution offered.
Your refund has been processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we have closed your case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a quick survey to help us improve our customer service for future cases.
